names.english: transform stasis and remove painful obstruction decoction
names.commonEnglish: Transform Stasis and Remove Painful Obstruction Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, reduces swelling, and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, harmonizes, nourishes and invigorates the Blood and disperses Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, for Wind-Damp Invasion blocking the Blood vessels causing pain, numbness and paralysis.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Dispels Blood Stasis and alleviates pain.
Invigorates the Blood, eliminates Blood Stasis, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and opens the channels and collaterals to alleviate pain.
Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction, alleviates pain and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
With Chuan Xiong, for Headache and generalized body aches and pains associated With the common cold or painful obstruction.
With Bai Zhi, for headaches.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, dispels Cold and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for headaches.
With Qiang Huo, for Wind-Cold Dampness causing fever, chills and headaches.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and alleviates pain.
With Qiang Huo, for Wind-Damp Bi causing joint pain. (especially in the upper joints)
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and collaterals, benefits the joints, stops spasms, promotes diuresis and reduces edema.
Clears Heat, dissolves Phlegm, calms Wind and stops convulsions.
Promotes Qi movement, dissipates nodules, unblocks the collaterals and alleviates pain.
Promotes the movement of Qi and invigorates the Blood, opens the Middle Jiao and unblocks the channels Expels Wind and promotes water metabolism
Invigorates the Blood
Transforms Stasis
Unblocks the Channels
Alleviates pain
syndromes: Advanced Qi and Blood Stagnation with severe pain

symptoms: Head, neck, shoulder, upper back and upper arm aching and pain
Pain worse at night and better during the day
The muscles of the arms are withered
Maybe numbness which is worse at night
The fingernails are cyanosed, sunken, concave and lack luster
manifestations.tongue: Dark purple or Static maculae or Spots
